channel.title: Virtual pcs?
channel.description: well i recently heard that you can auto on 2 + runescape accounts at once using a virtual pc. is this true? if it is how exactly would you do it? it would mean that the one auto is running in the background but when you move the mouse wouldnt it stuff up? so basically i want to know if its possible to auto on 2 + accounts [u]at once[/u] using virtual pcs or something else. thanks

item.title: Virtual pcs?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

A virtual PC emulates a pc, you get a new mouse pointer ect.

Read full topic
